ygData.subject: Re: about Endure Magic
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps this has been nerfed a little because it adds only 20 for me. For those of you who have been unable to research this one, you can buy it in the
ygData.messageBody:
Perhaps this has been nerfed a little because it adds only 20 for me.
For those of you who have been unable to research this one, you can buy
it in the cleric's guild. I failed my first research attempt and this
spell is too important to wait around for.

At level 20 now I can get beat up by monsters and still get my spells
off. Channeling ROCKS once you hit 20th. With Endure Magic on too I
can often cast through both spells and physical attacks.

Now if I had only picked agnostic when I chose my religion this
character would be just right for me...

--- Rob Berryhill <racefan@...> wrote:
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> It adds 25 to your magic resist. (at least at level
> 20 it did)
>
> Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
> Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
>
>
> >
> > From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
> >
> > I dont have this spell yet ( still researching it
> ).. I just want
> > to know if
> > somebody tried it and if it provided a good enough
> protection
> > against charm
> > to our tanks while hunting evil eyes. Everytime
> I've tried to
> > attack those,
> > I ended up having to fight all my tanks!
> > Skara de Toxxulia <Elite>
> >
>
>
>
